page.title: 16LEISURE
page.content: We did a survey about recreation.People in their spare time like to play sport with their friends.Most people swim about once a month though there are no swimming baths in the D-block.A lot of people spend some of their spare time in the pub-there are two pubs in the D-block;The Tom Finney and The Fleece Inn.Most people dislike smoking and smokers.There is a leisure centre in the D-block that a lot of people use.A few people go jogging and cycling though quite a lot prefer to watch television especially sport.Most people go out for a meal now and then.Young people like pop concerts though there are never any in the D-Block.
